get.description: Gives status about how recent the osm data is , it will give the last time that database was updated completely

post.summary: Get Osm Current Snapshot As File
post.description:
Generates the current raw OpenStreetMap data available on database based on the input geometry, query and spatial features.

Steps to Run Snapshot :

1.  Post the your request here and your request will be on queue, endpoint will return as following :
    {
        "task_id": "your task_id",
        "track_link": "/tasks/task_id/"
    }
2. Now navigate to /tasks/ with your task id to track progress and result

normal.summary: Example : Extract Evertyhing in the area
normal.description: **Query** to Extract everything in the area , You can pass your geometry only and you will get everything on that area

post.summary: Get Current Snapshot As Plain Geojson
post.description:
Simple API to get osm features as geojson for small region. This is designed only for querying small data for large data follow /snapshot/

Params ::

    bbox: Optional List = takes xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax uses srid=4326
    select: List = this is select query  you can pass [*] to select all attribute
    where: List[WhereCondition] = [{'key': 'building', 'value': ['*']},{'key':'amenity','value':['school','college']}]
    join_by: Optional[JoinFilterType] = or/ and
    look_in: Optional[List[OsmFeatureType]] = ["nodes", "ways_poly","ways_line","relations"] : tables name

normal.description: **Query** to extract administrative boundary of nepal in plain geojson format

second.description: **Query** to extract city bounadry in plain geojson format

schema.title: Response Get Current Snapshot As Plain Geojson Snapshot Plain  Post

get.description:
Tracks the request from the task id provided by Raw Data API  for the request

Args:

    task_id ([type]): [Unique id provided on response from /snapshot/]

Returns:

    id: Id of the task
    status : SUCCESS / PENDING
    result : Result of task

Successful task will have additional nested json inside

countryExport.title: Countryexport
countryExport.description: Intersects the passed geom to country boundary if set to true and exports whole country : Use with Caution , May take hours

filters.description: Filter for point,line,polygon/ all geometry for both select and where clause
